entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -25.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -28.7°C

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
